subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: In the span of one play, Darrell Bevell became the goat when the ball was intercepted at New England’s 1-yard line, allowing the Patriots to escape with a Super Bowl victory.
snippet: In the span of one play, Darrell Bevell became the goat when the ball was intercepted at New England’s 1-yard line, allowing the Patriots to escape with a Super Bowl victory.
